item.title: Jamie Lee Curtis on Reuniting With Lindsay Lohan for ‘Freakier Friday,’ Her ‘The Bear’ Emmy Nom and Stephen Colbert’s ‘Late Show’ Cancellation: ‘It’s Awful’
item.description: Jamie Lee Curtis says she’s learned a lot from Lindsay Lohan since reuniting for “Freakier Friday,” the much buzzed-about sequel to 2003’s “Freaky Friday.” “S
